description: Test Case 1: Valid Bus Ticket Search
pre_conditions: User is on the main search screen
testing_steps: Enter a valid origin city (e.g., Chennai) in the 'From' field.
Enter a valid destination city (e.g., Bengaluru) in the 'To' field.
Select a future date (e.g., tomorrow's date) from the date picker (assuming it exists).
Tap the 'SEARCH' button.

pre_conditions: User is on the main search screen
testing_steps: Enter a valid origin and destination city.
Attempt to select yesterday's date.
Observe the system response.

pre_conditions: User is on the main search screen
Origin and destination fields are filled with different cities
testing_steps: Tap the Swap button (usually with arrows icon).
Observe the origin and destination fields.

pre_conditions: User is on the main search screen
testing_steps: Leave the origin city field empty.
Enter a destination city.
Select a valid date.
Tap the 'Search' button.
Repeat steps 1-4 with an empty destination city field.
Repeat steps 1-4 with both origin and destination fields empty.

description: Test Case 5: Special Characters in City Names
pre_conditions: User is on the main search screen
testing_steps: Enter a city name containing an apostrophe (e.g., St. Louis).
Enter another city name with a hyphen (e.g., Port-au-Prince).
Select a valid date.
Tap the 'Search' button.
Observe the search results or error messages.
